Identification.name: queried name
Identification.description: The name of the compound as queried by the user.

Identification.name: name
Identification.description: The most common name of the compound.

Identification.name: description
Identification.description: A short description of the compound.

Identification.name: type
Identification.description: The type of molecule the compound belongs to.

Functional properties.name: mechanism of action
Functional properties.description: Any known mechanism by which the compound exerts its therapeutic effect.

Functional properties.name: biological function
Functional properties.description: The biological function of the compound, including its reported general function, interactions, metabolism, specificity, and pharmacodynamics.

values.name: reported general function
values.description: The reported general function of the compound.

values.name: interactions
values.description: The reported protein interactions of the compound.

values.name: metabolism
values.description: The reported metabolism of the compound.

values.name: specificity
values.description: The reported specific function of the compound.

values.name: pharmacodynamics
values.description: The reported pharmacodynamics of the compound.

Functional properties.name: target
Functional properties.description: The target of the compound, typically a protein or enzyme it interacts with.

Functional properties.name: toxicity
Functional properties.description: The potential for harm or danger posed by the compound to living organisms.

Functional properties.name: chemical experimental properties
Functional properties.description: Properties of the compound that are determined through laboratory experimentation.

Therapeutics.name: ingredients
Therapeutics.description: Type of ingredient(s) used in the compound.

Therapeutics.name: delivery
Therapeutics.description: Method of delivery or absorption of the compound.

Therapeutics.name: availability
Therapeutics.description: Type of availability and affected organism for the compound.

Therapeutics.name: elimination
Therapeutics.description: Route of elimination and clearance of the compound.

Therapeutics.name: withdrawn
Therapeutics.description: Withdrawal status and additional information about withdrawal.

values.name: additional informations regarding withdrawal
values.description: Additional information regarding the withdrawal of the compound.

Therapeutics.name: supplier
Therapeutics.description: Pharmaceutical developer or supplier of the biochem compound.

Chemical properties.name: Molecular formula
Chemical properties.description: Types of atoms and number of each element in a molecule of the compound.

Chemical properties.name: mass
Chemical properties.description: Molecular weight or mass of a compound, which is the sum of the atomic weights of all atoms in the molecule.

Chemical properties.name: molecular conformation
Chemical properties.description: Refers to the spatial arrangement of atoms in a molecule, including the stereochemistry, chirality, and atropisomerism of the compound.

Chemical properties.name: experimental properties
Chemical properties.description: Refers to properties that have been directly measured through experimentation, such as caco2 permeability, hydrophobicity, water solubility, and polar surface area (PSA).

Chemical properties.name: calculated properties
Chemical properties.description: Refers to properties that are estimated through mathematical or computational methods, such as HBA count, HBD count, and rotatable bond count.

Chemical properties.name: other experimental properties
Chemical properties.description: Refers to other properties that have been directly measured through experimentation, such as optical activity, boiling point, isoelectric point, melting point, logP, logS, pKa, and theoretical isoelectric point.

IDs.name: Other identifications
IDs.description: This section lists additional identifiers for the compound that are not covered by other fields.

Referrences.name: Popularity
Referrences.description: The number of citations that the compound has received from 1950-2000.

Referrences.name: Publications
Referrences.description: The publications where the compound has been mentioned or studied, including the source reported drug name(s), and synthesis references

Referrences.name: Patents
Referrences.description: The patents where the compound has been mentioned or studied.

Referrences.name: Other
Referrences.description: External sources where the compound has been mentioned or studied, including the source reported drug name(s), synthesis references, and other references.
